subject: Follow-up on Overdue Affiliate Commission â€“ November
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,

I hope you are doing well. I am writing to kindly follow up on my previous
email regarding my overdue affiliate commission for November. As of now, I
have not yet received a response, so I would greatly appreciate it if you
could help check and update me on the payment status.

Receiving this commission is important for me to continue maintaining and
optimizing my advertising campaigns. I look forward to your support and a
timely update.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance.

Sincerely,

conversations.body_text: Hi THUMMO,     We apologize for the delayed response. November commissions will be settled in January. We refined this policy in November due to our 30-day return period. Thank you for your understanding.
